title: Welcome to University Application Management Platform
subtitle: This is a professional university application tracking system that helps students, parents, and teachers better manage the university application process. Through role-based access control, it ensures that each user can securely access the appropriate functions.

student.title: Student
student.description: Manage your university applications, track progress, set reminders

parent.title: Parent
parent.description: View your child's application progress, add notes and suggestions

rbac.title: Role-Based Access Control
rbac.description: Different roles have different permissions, ensuring data security and privacy protection. Students can only access their own applications, parents can view but not modify, teachers can guide but not delete.

tracking.title: Real-time Progress Tracking
tracking.description: Track application status in real-time, set deadline reminders, ensure you don't miss important application milestones.

collaboration.title: Collaboration Features
collaboration.description: Parents can add notes to applications, teachers can provide guidance, students can share application progress, enabling multi-party collaboration.

security.title: Data Security
security.description: Uses JWT authentication, encrypted password storage, input validation, prevents SQL injection and XSS attacks, ensuring system security and reliability.

responsive.title: Responsive Design
responsive.description: Supports access from various devices, from mobile phones to desktop computers, providing a good user experience.

scalable.title: Scalable Architecture
scalable.description: Modular design supports future feature expansion, easily adding new roles and permissions.
